item.title: Introducing MicroRaft
item.description: Disclaimer: MicroRaft is a project I develop on my free time. It is not affiliated, associated, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with Facebook, or any of its subsidiaries or its affiliates. I am pleased to announce the first public release of MicroRaft! MicroRaft is a feature-complete, stable, production-grade and most importantly open-source implementation of the Raft consensus algorithm in Java. MicroRaft can be used for building highly available and strongly-consistent data, metadata and coordination services.
